```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide', message='FALSE'}
source("../../../rhelpers/knitr_setup.R")
```

----

The `leveneTest()` function requires that the `car` package be installed.  Thus, if you get this error ...
```{r error=TRUE}
leveneTest(extra~group,data=sleep)
```

then you need to make sure that the `car` package is loaded.
```{r message=FALSE}
library(car)
leveneTest(extra~group,data=sleep)
```
